content: to the back loop of the back side of the hat when you get to the end of the hat finish off and turn the hat right side out brim use the same color as last row or change to 1st color attach yarn at the slip_stitch round 1 chain 3 double_crochet double_crochet ldc *double_crochet double_crochet ldc repeat from * to end of row slip_stitch to ch3 round 2 chain 3 *fpdc bcdc repeat from * to end of round in the video she does one round for her brim if you want a larger brim repeat round 2 until the brim is the size you want optional 1 round of the rsc aka the crab stitch as a finishing round 3 diagram repeat row 3 and 4 until the hat is the desired height end with round 6 if you do the optional border the chain 1 doesn t count as a stitch 4
